dialogue: Don't interrupt me while I'm working today.
I need to maintain my flow.
You can interrupt me for an emergency.
Would it be an emergency if you had to sign for a package?
Well, no, but come get me if I need to sign for a package.
Are you about to list dozens of valid reasons to interrupt my flow until you wear me down?
Just because I have plenty of time and would enjoy it, that doesn't mean I'm doing it.
What if a skunk got into our heating ducts?
